advancedAnalysis.title: Advanced Analytics

strategies.title: Strategy Management
strategies.description: Document your strategies, analyze their compliance, measure their effectiveness and identify possible improvements.

statistics.title: Detailed Statistics
statistics.description: Advanced performance metrics: profit factor, win rate, drawdown, recovery ratios and much more.

emotions.title: Emotion Analysis

calendar.title: Calendar View

multiAccount.title: Multi-Account

insights.title: Smart Insights
insights.description: Discover your trading patterns, your most profitable moments and your habits to optimize your approach.

data.title: Centralized Data

visualization.title: Powerful Visualizations
visualization.description: Interactive charts and intuitive dashboards to quickly understand your performance.

improvement.title: Continuous Improvement

discipline.title: Mental Discipline

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: In accordance with applicable legislation (GDPR), users have the right to access, rectify, port and delete their personal data. Users can permanently delete their account and all their trading data at any time via the « Settings » / « Account » menu in the application. For any other request regarding your personal data, users can contact K&C Madin Invest.

cookies.title: Cookies and Local Storage
cookies.intro: This trading journal application uses only technical cookies necessary for its operation:
cookies.session: Session cookies: Maintaining your secure connection and authentication
cookies.csrf: CSRF cookies: Protection against Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks
cookies.storage: Local storage (localStorage): Temporary storage of your authentication preferences, language, and display settings
cookies.conclusion: No tracking, advertising or third-party analytics cookies are used. All cookies are secure (HTTPS transmission only) and contain no sensitive personal or financial data. Trading data is stored securely on our servers. You can delete cookies and local storage at any time via your browser settings.
